price: نو د خپل رب حكم ته صبر كوه او د ماهی والا غوندې مه كېږه چې نارې يې كړې او له غمه ډك شوى و.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
